title: My Mother-In-Law
lyrics:
[Intro]
Woo
[Verse 1]
Sick and tired of your mother
Tellin' me what to do
She's always stickin' her nose in my business
It seems I married her instead of you
[Chorus]
Oh, my mother-in-law (
Mother-in-law
)
Oh, she makes me sick (
Mother-in-law
)
Oh my mother-in-law (
Mother-in-law
)
I've got to get away from her quick now (
Woo
)
Got to get away from her quick (
Yeah
)
[Verse 2]
I've tried and tried to get along, but nothing I do is right
If she can't mind her business
I'm telling you what I'm gon' to do
I'm packing my bags and leaving tonight
[Chorus]
Oh, my mother-in-law (
Mother-in-law
)
Oh, she makes me scream, oh-ooh-hoo (
Mother-in-law
)
Oh, my mother-in-law (
Mother-in-law
)
It's worse than a horrible dream now (
Woo
)
Oh yeah, she's worse than a horrible dream (
Yeah
)
Woo

[Bridge]
Somebody's got to go (
It won't be me
)
It's either her or me (
It won't be me
)
I'm sick and tired of your mother
There's not enough room for us three
[Chorus]
Oh, my mother-in-law (
Mother-in-law
)
Oh, she worries me so (
Mother-in-law
)
Ooh, ooh, my mother-in-law now
You know she's got to go now (
Woo
), ooh yeah
You know she's got to go (
Yeah
)
[Outro]
Oh, my mother-in-law
(
Mother-in-law, mother-in-law
)
Oh, she worries me so
(
Mother-in-law, mother-in-law
)
She drinks all of my booze
(
Mother-in-law
)
